name: Sketch Jumper
description:
Controls:

SPACE = Start

A = Left

D = Right

W = Up Ladder

S = Down Ladder

SPACE = Jump

Description:

This is a follow up to a game I created while prototyping a project for my thesis. I loved the art concept but my review board didn't think the game play was right for the research. I wanted to work in the art style and make a "complete" project and I think I was successful in that mission.

Original Game is Research Rush. The game never made the leap to HTML (something was way off with my code. Here I used a code base from the GameMaker asset store by Bygdle called the "Basic platform game example" and added features, music, assets, and level design. I tried to reuse as much of the art I created for the original as I could.

Wasn't going to work on this but was inspired by Salvage Jam to complete it (my first game jam).
